  ],

    "3000"
  ],
  "database": [],
  "build_instructions": "To build this project, run the following commands in your terminal:

1. Navigate to the project directory:
   ```bash
   cd path/to/cloned_repos/node-express-hello-world
   ```

2. Install the dependencies:
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

3. Start the server:
   ```bash
   npm start
   ```

The server will be accessible at `http://localhost:3000`."
}
```

Install dependencies: `npm install` (for frontend) and `pip install -r requirements.txt` (for backend)\n4. Set up the environment variables: `cp .env.example .env` and update the values\n5. Start the application: `npm start` (for frontend) and `python app.py` (for backend)"
